meanings.definition: Beyond the mountains; specifically, south of the Alps, in Italy.
meanings.sent1: The traveler journeyed ultramontane to reach the sunny lands beyond the peaks.
meanings.sent2: She traveled ultramontane to explore the beautiful countryside of Italy.
meanings.sent3: The adventurous hiker decided to go ultramontane to find the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent4: His dreams took him ultramontane, where the sun always shone brightly.
meanings.sent5: The idea of going ultramontane seemed like a magical adventure.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the Roman Catholic Church in countries south of the Alps.
meanings.sent1: The ultramontane traditions of the church were deeply rooted in history.
meanings.sent2: She admired the ultramontane architecture of the cathedral in Italy.
meanings.sent3: The ultramontane choir sang hymns that echoed through the ancient walls.
meanings.sent4: His ultramontane beliefs guided him in times of uncertainty.
meanings.sent5: The ultramontane influence could be seen in the religious art of the region.
